fulltext:
1 
• 
Full name: Nguyễn Văn Toàn (called as Tom).  
• 
Birthday: March 25th, 1988.  
• 
Gender: Male 
• 
Position applied: Senior Video Stream Engineer 
• 
Locate: Ho Chi Minh City 
SUMMARY  
• 
Keen on many IT skills, ever startup.  
• 
Graduated universities with three degrees, Engineer of Electronics-Telecommunications, Bachelor 
of Business and Administration and Engineer of Information Technology.  
• 
Pre-PMP at FMIT in 2014.  
OBJECTIVE  
• 
Finding a startup company to fight for success; 
• 
Building startup company product from beginning stage or develop with team.  
EDUCATION  
• 
Engineering of Information Technology, Posts and Telecommunications Institute of 
Technology.  
• 
Engineering of Electronics & Telecommunications, Posts and Telecommunications Institute of 
Technology.  
• 
Bachelor of Business and Administration, Business and Administration, Open University.  
• 
Pre PMP, FMIT 2014.  
 TECHNICAL SKILLS  
• 
Web:  
- 
HTML: Version 5, Master, DOM, element, node or data attribute, coding, debug, and optimize.  
- 
CSS: Version 3, Master, coding, debug and optimize.  
- 
JS: ESMAC6, Master, coding, analysis, debug and optimize.  
- 
Low level and basically-core coding, framework as ReactJS, Angular, is still ok.  
- 
Building Google Closure core project for team to code, arrange and optimize team code.  
- 
Building project core functions/library for team to apply.  
- 
Obfuscated/Minified code before publishing to user.  
2 
• 
Server:  
- 
Nodejs: install, config, implement, optimize and secure application system.  
- 
Nginx: install, config, for proxy, load balancing, debug and test system topology.  
- 
Redis: install, config, administrate, pub/stub for multiple chat, GEO location API.  
- 
MongoDB: install, config, administrate, coding, optimize, design database models.  
- 
VMWare: install, config for ESXi VMs, VLan network group, monitor application, API 
framework connection.  
- 
VirtualBox: install, setup, administrate and SDK connect API.  
- 
Git: install, config, setup and adjust functions flexibly as hooking at server/client side and 
permission, can work with concentration and distribution, help team deploy by pushing 
command/commit, resolve conflict, merge code and save team with and git related problem, 
also change content of commit, author, committer, …  
- 
Gitlab: install, config and administrate system, connect HOOK, and adjust system detail, or 
Gitlab load balancing one or multi-server for Redis, Postgres, SSH/SSHD, NFS, …  
- 
NFS/UnionFS: install, config, merge many disks to a unified disk for larger capacitor.  
- 
SSH/SSD: install, config, secure system access, detect and deal with connect to system by 
another authentication.  
- 
ISPConfig: install, config, administrate, hock external API and connect to ISPConfig.  
- 
Linux: Master Debian, User/Group permission, thread and process, CPU/Server bottleneck and 
optimization, ...  
- 
HTTP/TCP/UDP/PORT/Sock/Socket/Domain proxy, OSI Layer Model, TCP/IP Layer Model.  
- 
UFW/IP Table: install, config, administrate, routing IP/Port, or permit/denied access resources.  
- 
Router/Switch: setup and configure is ok for me, Port forwarding, NAT, Routing, Load 
balancing ISP server from multi-ISP, also RADIUS connect is ok, …  
- 
MySQL/Postgres/PHP/Java, … is ok for me.  
iOS:  
- 
Master Architecture, implement, debug, optimize with Objective C (recommend for low-level) 
and Swift. Also build base project for Team to start and build utility library/function to help 
coder quickly completed features. Publish app and deal with iTuneConnect rule to submit and 
get rid of private API, denied functions/features.  
- 
Build Core, simple project, for team to implement, guide and review code and also optimize.  
Android:  
- 
Review and merge code, optimize team code as project coding guide line.  
- 
Can coding with Java also Kotlin and submit Google PlayStore.  
Hybrid/Cross Platform:  
- 
Master PhoneGap/Cordova.  
- 
Know quickly other framework quickly as React Native and apply.  
- 
Can build new cross-platform for mobile and desktop.  
Architecture:  
- 
Design and setup application system architecture in Software coding, pattern and model, micro 
service in integrated system or distributed system, and Server system.  
- 
Design Server system architecture, server connecting topology, network connection, network 
protocol and network topology.  
• 
• 
• 
• 
3 
- 
Design private network and connection for application as VPN, SSH Tunneling, encryption 
connection/data.  
- 
Design and implement cloud CDN depend on existed infrastructure.  
- 
Database mirror/cluster with MongoDB.  
- 
Application Cluster/Multithread and Permission.  
- 
DNS resolutions local/private solutions, encrypted data.  
- 
Can apply Software and hardware to optimize for application system to match with goals.  
- 
Monitor server system with solutions and DDOS mitigating solutions.  
- 
Master with Digital Ocean cloud.  
- 
AWS is ok, ever work with EC2, S3, Elastic Beanstalks, Memcached, DynamoDB, RDS, …  
- 
GCP: ever work with App Engine, Cloud Storage, Cloud Data Store (NoSQL), Cloud Memory 
Store.  
 Give me a problem or a situation I will reply you a better solution match your missions!  
• 
Management:  
- 
Experiencing for 4 years of being worked as a CEO.  
- 
Can manage, training and coach team up to 48 members (4 years of experience).  
- 
Technical transfer and reviewing.  
- 
Can work with SCRUM/Agile or PMP project style, also Waterfall (IT section rarely to apply 
due to many effected of CRs).  
- 
Soft skill and Problem solving for a mission.  
PRIOR WORKING EXPERIENCE:  
HORICAL  
Durations: FROM 5/2015 - 5/2019.  
• 
Description: Work as a CEO to build team for products ERP besides Outsourcing for US and 
Vietnam markets.  
• 
Accomplishments  
- 
VSIP: Support VSIP (Vietnam Singapore Industrial Park) and their Tenant connect 
quickly, https://app.vsip.com.vn/   
- 
MTB: Help worker to estimate car repairing and replacement for US market, 
https://www.mobiletechrx.com/about-us/   
- 
CM: Collect user distance with kinds of workout as Run, Walk, Bike, 
https://charitymiles.org/  
- 
StatUp: Manage football team and teammate skill and propose for potential players.  
- 
Squint: Search content for key word from mobile device and read its content.  
- 
Moxxly: Manage and statistic pump volume for mother after pregnant.  
- 
Dogtelligent: Manage Dog pet via phone Bluetooth.  
- 
…  
• 
Technologies: Manager, Teamwork Management, VMWare, Sphere ESXI 6.x, Nginx, Apache, 
GitLab, Git LFS, SSH, HTTP2, ISPConfig, PAM, Dovecot, Postfix, ERP, Linux/Unix Kernel, 
FreeBSD, …
